ABOUT MCF/ WHY MCF/ Vision ,\nMission, Value

My classroom Foundation (MCF) is India’s first platform that provides free test series and is a one-stop solution for aspirants.

MCF covers all major examinations like NEET, JEE and other exams like SSC, PO etc which are available across the country. We at MCF believe in smart study, Hence we provide depth analyses of various examinations.

Starting from the exam calendar of every academic year, We provide exact & most accurate syllabus, reference books, previous year papers, model question papers, trend, topic evaluations & weightage, topper’s strategy etc.

Experts from every field having hands-on experience in their respective fields are part of MCF which is an enriching factor. Teachers have also supported MCF & they take our tests in schools like Navodaya which is considered to be the of the best in India.

We are highly obliged to work for our country & help create a better society. All we need is your hunger for excellence and your love for your country. Thus, Keep practicing-Keep learning-Keep visiting MCF!

● Free of cost platform for all examinations.
● One step solution for all your exam needs. 
● Clear & concise information filtered by a panel of experts in their field. 
● Real Examination atmosphere provided for better results. 
● Better analysis for your performance. 
● Real time feedback & improvement with customised support as your needs. 
● Material recommended by top educators. 
● Hassle free solution. 
● Data privacy & transparency- No unnecessary interruptions, No hidden Charges. 
● In accordance with NEP 2020 (Latest).

“Practice makes a man perfect”

MCF aims to establish quality education & excellence via practice. We will ensure all your practice exams come at No Cost so you perform well in your field. 

We will be covering 100% of examinations conducted across the country and reach 100% of our aspirants & that's when we will rest! 

We believe Education is your birthright & you shall have it - hence our duty is to ensure that everyone of you shall have it!
We give marks to your effort not your 3 hr. Test. More marks on your effort will eventually bring more marks on your test!!
We believe nobody is a failure- You just didn’t practice enough!!
